title: Very Spacious Clean Flat w/Views; Double Pane Windows and Patio Doors!
posting_body: Very Spacious, Clean, and Bright Flat - Great Views from both ends of the flat and Newer, Double-paned, Energy efficient Windows/Patio Deck Doors
Beautiful, clean, bright, very spacious (approximately 2000 square feet) 5 bedroom/2bathroom flat.
Please note that the living room and dining room have been used as bedrooms, but they can easily be used as common areas.
The kitchen is very large and can fit a large table seating six.
Here are more details:
-newer, double-paned, energy-efficient windows and patio doors
-one very large bedroom (the size of a studio apartment) with two closets with view of Golden Gate Park and Sutro Tower
-two large bedrooms with walk-in closets, one with view of Golden Gate Park and Sutro Tower
-two bedrooms (one large and one medium sized) with patio doors opening to a shared deck with Pacific Ocean and windmill views
-two full bathrooms
-large electric kitchen with lots of cabinet space
-lots of extra storage (Including four additional closets) within the common areas of the flat.
No additional storage outside the flat.
-building is semi-detached for increased privacy

-located in a nice and quiet neighborhood convenient to public transportation to downtown, S.F. State, and USF (muni lines 38, 31, 5, 1, 18 and downtown express buses 38AX, 31AX, and 1AX) as well as a block and a half away from VA Hospital with shuttle buses to UCSF
-neighborhood also surrounded by open space (Golden Gate Park, the beach, hiking trails, Lincoln Park, Sutro Park)
-also convenient to banks, grocery stores, variety of restaurants and cafes, a movie theater, public library
-no laundry
-carpets professionally cleaned
-Street parking only.
No permit required.
-tenant responsible for all utilities
-please no Section 8, no pets, non-smokers, no satellite TV dish
-convenient intercom entry system
-available: immediately
